collectible.title: Desire and Hope
collectible.text: "This light... is all of you." Special thanks to all of the artists on our server that helped make Yusuke's various paintings! You can now view all of them in this album: https://imgur.com/a/yMQEWIc
collectible.unlock: Witness the creation of three paintings by Yusuke. Different opponents may guarantee you different paintings! (Note: Yusuke must lose early enough to have time to paint.)

collectible.title: Old Reading Material
collectible.text: Left behind by Yusuke, this magazine is worn down, indicating that he's had it for quite some time. Perusing through the pages you notice that he's been doodling various designs for... tarot cards? There also appears to be a concise shopping list consisting of eggs, ramen, and pocky. Moving onto the final page, there's a shockingly detailed sketch of your face... but why does it have six eyes? You'll have to ask Yusuke the next time you see him.
